level.text: A licensee, graduate student, or clinical fellow shall adhere to the standards set forth in the most current publication of the “Code of Ethics” as published by the American Speech-Language-Hearing Association, as it may be republished from time to time.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 7314 (September 4, 2009); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 14806 (October 18, 2013).
